Class Data

java.lang.Object
worldofzuul.util.Data
public class Data
extends java.lang.Object
The type Data. Contains static functions used for file IO.

    • getImages

      public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​javafx.scene.image.Image> getImages​(java.lang.String directory, java.lang.Class<? extends javafx.fxml.Initializable> CallerClass)
      Gets images. Loads all images in all subdirectories given the directory path.
      Parameters:
      directory - the directory path
      CallerClass - the JavaFX caller controller class, used to load image files as resources into Image
      Returns:
      Hashmap of strings and images, the string keys are the path, from the given directory path, to the the image value

    • cutSprites

      public static java.util.List<javafx.scene.image.Image[]> cutSprites​(javafx.scene.image.Image image, int dimension)
      Cut sprites list. Cuts an image into a list of image arrays. Can be seen of as cutting the a sprite sheet into a grid using the the given dimensions.
      Parameters:
      image - the sprite-sheet to cut
      dimension - the sprite dimensions
      Returns:
      list of image arrays

    • singleImageToArrays

      public static javafx.scene.image.Image[][] singleImageToArrays​(javafx.scene.image.Image image)
      Adds a single image to an array of image arrays.
      Parameters:
      image - the image
      Returns:
      the array of image arrays
